00110 
00111 int Champ_P0_PolyMAC::imprime(Sortie& os, int ncomp) const
00112 {
00113   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis = zone_dis_base();
00114   const Zone& zone = zone_dis.zone();
00115   const DoubleTab& coord=zone.domaine().coord_sommets();
00116   const int nb_som = zone.domaine().nb_som();
00117   const DoubleTab& val = valeurs();
00118   int som;
00119   os << nb_som << finl;
00120   for (som=0; som<nb_som; som++)
00121     {
00122       if (dimension==3)
00123         os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " << coord(som,2) << " " ;
00124       if (dimension==2)
00125         os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " ;
00126       if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00127         os << val(som) << finl;
00128       else
00129         os << val(som,ncomp) << finl;
00130     }
00131   os << finl;
00132   Cout << "Champ_P0_PolyMAC::imprime FIN >>>>>>>>>> " << finl;
00133   return 1;
00134 }
00135 
00136 int Champ_P0_PolyMAC::fixer_nb_valeurs_nodales(int n)
00137 {
00138   if (n == zone_dis_base().zone().nb_elem()) //champ sans flux aux faces (ex. aiguilles)
00139     creer_tableau_distribue(zone_dis_base().zone().md_vector_elements());
00140   else //champ avec flux
00141     creer_tableau_distribue(ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC, zone_dis_base()).mdv_elems_faces);
00142   return n;
00143 }
00144 
00145 Champ_base& Champ_P0_PolyMAC::affecter_(const Champ_base& ch)
00146 {
00147   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC,la_zone_VF.valeur());
00148   DoubleTab_parts part(valeurs());
00149   for (int i = 0; i < part.size(); i++) ch.valeur_aux(i ? zone.xv() : zone.xp(), part[i]);
00150   valeurs().echange_espace_virtuel();
00151   return *this;
00152 }
00153 
00154 // utilitaires pour CL
00155 void Champ_P0_PolyMAC::init_cl() const
00156 {
00157   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC,la_zone_VF.valeur());
00158   const Conds_lim& cls = ma_zone_cl_dis.valeur().les_conditions_limites();
00159   int i, f, n;
00160 
00161   if (icl.dimension(0)) return;
00162   icl.resize(zone.nb_faces_tot(), 3);
00163   for (n = 0; n < cls.size(); n++)
00164     {
00165       const Front_VF& fvf = ref_cast(Front_VF, cls[n].frontiere_dis());
00166       int idx = sub_type(Echange_externe_impose, cls[n].valeur()) + 2 * sub_type(Echange_global_impose, cls[n].valeur())
00167                 + 4 * sub_type(Neumann_paroi, cls[n].valeur())      + 5 * (sub_type(Neumann_homogene, cls[n].valeur()) || sub_type(Neumann_sortie_libre, cls[n].valeur()) || sub_type(Symetrie, cls[n].valeur()))
00168                 + 6 * sub_type(Dirichlet, cls[n].valeur())          + 7 * sub_type(Dirichlet_homogene, cls[n].valeur());
00169       if (sub_type(Echange_contact_PolyMAC, cls[n].valeur()) && sub_type(Schema_Euler_Implicite, equation().schema_temps())
00170           && ref_cast(Schema_Euler_Implicite, equation().schema_temps()).thermique_monolithique()) idx = 3;
00171       if (!idx) Cerr << "Champ_P0_PolyMAC : CL non codee rencontree!" << finl, Process::exit();
00172       for (i = 0; i < fvf.nb_faces_tot(); i++)
00173         f = fvf.num_face(i), icl(f, 0) = idx, icl(f, 1) = n, icl(f, 2) = i;
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 DoubleTab& Champ_P0_PolyMAC::valeur_aux_faces(DoubleTab& dst) const
00178 {
00179   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC, zone_dis_base());
00180   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins();
00181   const DoubleTab& src = valeurs();
00182 
00183   /* vals doit etre pre-dimensionne */
00184   int i, e, f, n, N = (src.nb_dim() == 1 ? 1 : src.dimension(1));
00185   assert(dst.dimension(0) == zone.xv().dimension(0) && N == (dst.nb_dim() == 1 ? 1 : dst.dimension(1)));
00186 
00187   if (src.dimension_tot(0) > zone.nb_elem_tot()) //on a les valeurs aux faces
00188     for (f = 0; f < dst.dimension(0); f++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) dst(f, n) = src(zone.nb_elem_tot() + f, n);
00189   else for (f = 0; f < dst.dimension(0); f++) //on prend (amont + aval) / 2
00190       for (i = 0; i < 2 && (e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++)
00191           dst(f, n) += src(e, n) * (f < zone.premiere_face_int() ? 1 : 0.5);
00192 
00193   return dst;
00194 }
